commands.name: get
commands.description: Displays information on a given player's character.

optional.name: player
description: Player to get the character for if not looking for the character of the author

commands.name: create
commands.description: Creates a channel category, two channels, and role for the adventure

commands.name: dm_add
commands.description: Adds a DM to an adventure

commands.name: dm_remove
commands.description: Removes a DM from an adventure. This command will fail if there is only 1 DM for the adventure

commands.name: add
commands.description: Adds a player or players to an adventure

optional.name: calc_tier
description: Whether to recalculate the adventure tier on player add.
Default is True. This is here in case we are re-adding a player's playing at a lower level, but we don't
want to use their current character level in the adventure tier calculations

commands.name: remove
commands.description: Removes a player from an adventure

commands.name: close
commands.description: Closes and adventure and removes roles from players

category.name: Room
category.description: Tools for DM's to manage channels within their adventure without having manage server permissions

commands.name: add_room
commands.description: Adds a channel with the given name to the Adventure category
